title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: Retribution
description: Command any of the six unique factions in the next standalone expansion of the critically acclaimed Dawn of War real-time strategy franchise. Choose to build a massive army or lead a small squad of elite heroes into battle and experience a single player campaign customized to your favorite race. Go online and face off against your enemies and experience the fast brutal combat of the 41st millennium. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II Free Download

system_requirements.OS *: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7
system_requirements.Processor: Pentium IV 3.2Ghz, or any dual core processor
system_requirements.Video Card: 128 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT / ATI X1600)
